entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0][mono][wasm] Assertion mono-internal-hash.c:47, condition `table->table != NULL' not met #91244
    8.0.0
  • Too many duplicate xxx.runtimeconfig.json #91238
  • Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' during 'Generate code' #91215
  • Assertion failed 'isValidVectorElemsizeFloat(size)' during 'Generate code' #91214
  • [mono][jit] Optimize Vector124.Create on Arm64 #91211
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op2Reg' during 'Generate code' #91209
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op3Reg' during 'Generate code' #91208
  • Inline ManagedThreadId #91205
    9.0.0
  • Improve single file publish to allow embedding of other digital assets without self-extraction #91202
  • Scoped service working out of a scope. #91243
  • [API Proposal]: An attribute to indicate boxed value type is not expected for certain API #91191
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty #91188
    Future
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49826/test49826/test49826.sh #91187
    8.0.0
  • NET 8.0 Preview 7 Perfomance Regression: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance #91186

Closed

  • CI build: Slow macs causing random legs to timeout #73401
    8.0.0
  • Cms signature created with .Net Framework cannot be verified with .Net Core for an elliptic curve certificate #77377
    Future
  • The `FindPythonInterp` will be removed by cmake #89424
  • Add a build to test the runtime repo with the daily Product build #42019
    8.0.0
  • Slow startup when publish single file with self-contained #79023
    8.0.0
  • ProvideCorrectArgumentsToFormattingMethodsAnalyzer throws IndexOutOfRangeException when building Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #90357
    8.0.0
  • illink roslyn analyzer: resolve code-style analysis warnings and update `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisCSharpCodeStyleVersion` to sync with `MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS` #91030
    8.0.0
  • Perf is not working for JITed code in DotNet (Mono Runtime) #85706
  • desired .NET 7.0 p/invoke signature for CallNtPowerInformation() is unclear #90785
    8.0.0
  • Debugging Blazor WASM in Edge Browser - missing files #91198
    8.0.0
  • condition `var->opcode == OP_REGOFFSET` not met on Mono-based SDK #90292
    8.0.0
  • Uri.IsBaseOf(bool) not true by user info #88265
    9.0.0
  • x64 JIT crash 'Compiler::implResolveToken' for typeof(ValueType) containing array of self #10431
    Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Bad CastToType() in gtFoldExprConst() for a cast from long" #90798
    9.0.0
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes.Pbkdf2 is trimming unfriendly #91181
    9.0.0
  • Publishing blazor project fails with: An element with the same key was already inserted #91196
  • Set BUILDTOOLS_SOURCE to local buildtools package dir results in build error #10922
    Future
  • [mono] Tests `System.IO.Hashing.Tests.Crc32Tests` crashing on tvos-arm64 #90499
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Unnecessary stack spill when mixing fixed pointers and refs in same method #12332
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91247
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0] Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #91246
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91245
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2254431 #91242
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add comments to binding gen tests for invocations on new lines #91237
    area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove AD0001 NoWarn from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions project #91236
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • catch closing exception in HttpListener #91234
    area-System.Net
  • Use live illink to trim framework #91233
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Code cleanup: remove unused code in debugger patch skip logic #91230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Disable failing test tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #91226
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on Arm64 #91225
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] UMEntryThunkCode::Poison() #91221
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Emit interceptor info correctly when invocation expr is on separate line #91218
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Test hot/cold splitting in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 pipeline #91217
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix unsafe accessor related issue for full AOT #91216
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Fix various HW intrinsic lowerings for unused values #91213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix unused variable warnings #91212
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] download sequence optimization #91201
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add blazor startup measurements to browser-bench #91199
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix accumulation of repro files #91194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary JIT workarounds in Utf8 transcoding #91193
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][metadata] Replace use of mem manager lock with loader lock #91190
    area-VM-meta-mono

Merged

  • Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91183
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix deprecated usages of FindPythonInterp CMake module #91206
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove get_ManagedThreadId FCall #91232
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Recommend [In] and [Out] attributes on array parameters #91231
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to ListDictionaryInternal #91224
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove AD0001 NoWarn from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions project #91222
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Prevent restore from deleting mibc cache file #91220
    needs-area-label
  • Improve usage of hashing for trimmer friendliness #91185
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Address warnings from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis upgrade #91034
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Enable `System.IO.Hashing` tests on ios and disable them on tvos #91195
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Revert perfowl runs back to ubuntu.1804 as they are not on ubuntu 2204 #91223
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use AVX512 to zero locals #91166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2253244 #91159
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix diagnostic creation to ensure including the URI #91145
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91061
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91008
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid user info processing #91106
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix summary label not being visible on Catalyst library tests #91200
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BOOL #90981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Change debugger listening port in samples to an unused one #91192
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Enable `System.IO.Hashing` tests on ios and disable them on tvos #90984
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix Http2 MultiConnection test race conditions #91156
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing tfm net9.0 changes #91105
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve updating classes for generics #88277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #91046
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #91059
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91152
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ContainerHttpException contains request instead of response #34979

Closed

  • DOTNET_GENERATE_ASPNET_CERTIFICATE environment variable ignored in dotnet CLI first-time use flow #34779
  • Package validation fail in .NET 8 with Unnecessary suppressions found #34936
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Added JavaScript import after #34983
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Change containers publish target to require IsPublishable (and explicit SDK Container support) #34980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expose CallCountThreshold and CallCountingDelayMs config knobs #34968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.2 in /eng/dependabot #34967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.8.2 in /eng/dependabot #34964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34660
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0] Update IsTargetFrameworkCompatible check #34954
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2253824 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions builder method: public vs. accessible. #7498

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: Improve error message for spread element type with no GetEnumerator() method #69745
  • False positive CS0169 reported for structs with used fixed buffer #69738
  • Configure Severity Of Multiple Analyzer Rules By Tag #69737

Closed

  • WellKnownFixAllProviders.BatchFixer does not apply fixes in auto-generated code #69739

PullRequests

Created

  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #69747
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Followup PR to https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/69677 to reduce allocations further. #69746
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge main into release/dev17.8 for snap #69744
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, untriaged
  • Pass project file name when building before running tests #69743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add restricted IVT to Intellicode #69742
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.8 P3 #69741
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix NRT annotations in ASP.net EA api #69726
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P2
  • Add notification for project configuration telemetry to match VS/O# #69714
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.8 P2
  • Add granular opt-in property for interceptors #69712
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8 P2
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8 P2

Updated

  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix the ArgumentOutOfRangeException in inline rename #69708
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Enable the test method finder to find tests in nested classes. #69716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix vsix dependency #69709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fixing error formatting for generic attribute missing errors #69735
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Report missing diagnostic for typeless expression in binary operation #69727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom unhandled exception logging #50385
  • Unable to navigate to an action in controller from Razor component in Blazor Web app #50384
  • Debug in Blazor United App #50383
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50382
  • Quarantine `ServerErrorNotificationTest.ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Dismiss` and `ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Reload` #50377
  • Improve perf of forms by caching lambda expression compilation #50376
  • [Blazor] Support resolving keyed services from DI #50374
    8.0-rc2
  • Needed guidance for a memory usage #50370
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook uses soon-to-be-obsolete Facebook Graph version v11 in .NET 6 #50366
  • Inconsistency between IIS and Kestrel for websocket connect operation with duplicate 'Upgrade: websocket, websocket' header #50364

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #50283
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50306
  • Blazor App encounters synchronous IO operation disallowed exception when outputting a lot of content #50319
  • SignalR Stateful Reconnect API #49977
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Ignore read only properties in form mapping #49545
    8.0-rc2
  • Base Href Changing Or Normal Refresh #49931
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50351

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50386
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Don't display the reconnection dialog after an error occurs #50381
    area-blazor
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor
  • Fix error message in CodeCheck file #50375
    area-infrastructure
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • Remove explicit UseRouting from templates #50372
    area-mvc
  • Use SDK with renamed Razor compiler DLLs #50369
    area-razor.compiler

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50281
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine error notification tests #50378
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Quarantine error notification tests #50379
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Update NavMenu.razor to use project name #50194
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-networking, area-routing
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2254265 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity
  • Update IdWeb 2.13.2 #50072
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nightly Builds fail to compile #17040
  • Hot reload file save issue in .NET MAUI #17038
  • Using Columnspan in Grid affects row heights #17037
  • Multiple Duplicate Scans Generated in Rapid Succession with Zebra EMDK #17031
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc1] [Android] Removing ItemSource item in ListView causes crash #17028
    .NET 8 GA
  • iOS Grid, Frame dynamic content, doesn't show #17027
    Backlog

Closed

  • [regression/8.0] [iOS] Border appears to be offsetting content incorrectly #15183
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] Border background color on Android is different than iOS #15794
    .NET 8 GA
  • iOS: Content in `Border` with `StrokeShape` of `Ellipse` not rendered correctly. #14927
    .NET 8 GA
  • Android CollectionView leaks if given a header or footer #16961
    Backlog
  • SearchHandler in Shell on iOS Crashes #16550
    Backlog
  • MAUI iOS Crashes when navigating with Shell #17034
  • Radio buttons work correctly with Windows, but they do not work at all with Android. #16873
  • dotnet publish for iOS fails on Azure but succeeds locally on the same build machine #17029
  • When publishing a DotNet 7 MAUI app, files are recompiled multiple times #17021
  • Unnecessary Compiler rebuilds #17005
  • Unable to deploy only myApp to iOS device #16835
  • IsEnabled currently doesn't do anything when set on a ContextMenu #9583
    .NET 8 GA
  • Support to get drag and drop position from DragEventArgs #2793
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Placeholder text issues MacCatalyst & iOS #16656
    .NET 8 GA
  • Binding of Entry control seems to break after entering text in Entry #16859
  • Dynamic Resource TextColor of Label didn't update when the theme changes in Mac #10738
    Backlog
  • Inputs on WPF Blazor Web View Control Not showing right click #11398
    .NET 8 Planning
  • App is crashing on using "Share" word in MenuFlyoutSubItem #16618
    Backlog
  • Shell.Current.CurrentPage is always null #17019

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix UI drag & drop tests #17044
    area/testing
  • Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
  • Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17042
  • Fixed window not reacting to TitleBar wnd message #17041
    platform/windows 🪟, i/regression
  • Fix TabbedPage title displaying incorrectly #17039
    community ✨
  • [Controls] Move ITextInput and IFontElement to InputView #17036
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [android] CollectionView logical children grows with Header/Footer #17012
    .NET 8 GA
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • Remove pinning to NET7 SDK #17035
  • Add GetPosition method to DragStartingEventArgs, DragEventArgs, and DropEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rx1] Bump xamarin-macios rc1 packages #17033
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/upstream, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.3 to 7.0.4 #17032
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17025
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix CollectionView not displaying header or footers #16870
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix #16470 - [Android] Improvements to TabbedPage API #16965
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix blurry FontImageSource icons in iOS Tab Bar and buttons #16864
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix for Spinner not disappearing in RefreshView #16997
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17024
    .NET 8 GA
  • Rename Accelerator to KeyboardAccelerator #16740
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • [RC1] Implement Platform Args for Drag and Drop EventArgs #16962
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, area/platform, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • Grid distribution fix #17023
    community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Windows CollectionView TapGesture from keyboard #16952
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • Avoid NRE if no shell items are visible #16946
    area/shell 🐢, Under Consideration
  • Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • [WinUI] Fix borders not showing bottom and right side #17016
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core 7.0 memory leak in ASP.NET Core API application but not in Console application #31576
  • Entity type configuration can run more than once, causing problems with seed data #31574
  • Batched queries for lazy loading #31567
  • Many-to-many with Temporal Table #31565
  • Method for Latest EF core compatible with .NET framework >4.5 #31564
  • HierarchyId as primary key, all examples with path strings, but how idiomatic add an entity under another. #31563

Closed

  • Will DistinctBy be supported in Filtered Include? #31554
  • SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31355
    8.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Scaffolding: Add usings for UseProvider call #31573
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.56.0 #31572
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31575
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449
